Sequence Information.Peptide Name: ABF-2 (antibac/terial factor-2, UCSS1a; natural AMPs; roundworms, nematode, invertebrates, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: A recombinant form exhibited 50% Microbicidal concentrations (BC50) in the range of 0.005 to 0.9 uM against Gram+ bacteria B. subtilis IFO3134, K. varians MAFF118076, S. aureus ATCC6538P, Gram- bacteria A. tumefaciens MAFF1001, B. bacteriovorus MAFF106101,  K. pneumoniae MAFF519002, and yeasts C. krusei MAFF114085),  K. hermotolerans MAFF113848, P. anomala MAFF113717, and S. cerevisiae MAFF113011. Updated 11/2015.
Literature Information.Author: Kato Y, Aizawa T, Hoshino H, Kawano K, Nitta K, Zhang H.2002
Literature Information.Title: abf-1 and abf-2, ASABF-type antimicrobial peptide genes in Caenorhabditis elegans
